mapper.select: select count(comm_id) as total,ewarn_level elevel from pss_price_ewarn group by ewarn_level

select ppe.*,wp.code_name ewarn_name from pss_price_ewarn ppe LEFT JOIN wp_ascii_info wp ON wp.code_id = ppe.ewarn_level where comm_id in (select pcc.comm_id from pss_comm_total pcc where pcc.parent_code = #{commId}) and #{dateStr}>= date(ewarn_date) order by ewarn_date desc limit 0,1;
select STR_TO_DATE(ewarn_date,'%Y-%m-%d') from pss_price_ewarn where comm_id = #{commId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ewarn_date desc limit 1
